dishes.name: Greek Salad
dishes.description: Crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives and feta cheese.

dishes.name: Grilled Chicken
dishes.description: Juicy chicken breast marinated in lemon, garlic, and oregano, then grilled to perfection.

dishes.name: Pesto Pasta
dishes.description: Al dente pasta tossed with homemade basil pesto, cherry tomatoes, and fresh Parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Beef Burger
dishes.description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.description: Thin-crust pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil. An italian classic

dishes.name: Garlic Shrimp
dishes.description: Linguine pasta tossed with garlic shrimp, cherry tomatoes, and spinach. A light and flavorful dish.
